1.	Install 7zip
2.	Extract this OpenCV build to the dependencies directory using 7zip: https://github.com/opencv/opencv/releases/download/3.1.0/opencv-3.1.0.exe
3.	Extract these FFmpeg builds to the dependencies directory using 7zip: http://ffmpeg.zeranoe.com/builds/win64/dev/ffmpeg-2.7-win64-dev.7z and http://ffmpeg.zeranoe.com/builds/win64/shared/ffmpeg-2.7-win64-shared.7z
